name: Kowloon Sumulator 2020
description:
Put on some of your favorite tunes and wander the twisting alleys of Kowloon. Discover bizarre and impossible alleys, teleport across great distances, and get lost in an endlessly looping maze.

This game was written in C using SDL and OpenGL. You're more than welcome to inspect the source code, or to build the game yourself.

  • Move the mouse to look around
  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Shift to move faster

Don't expect miracles, it's only a gamejam game.
